titles.title: Energy Efficiency for Affordable Housing Act
Energy Efficiency for Affordable Housing Act

A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the low-income housing credit for rehabilitation expenditures for buildings achieving enhanced energy performance, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Energy Efficiency for Affordable Housing Act
This bill increases the amount of the low-income housing tax credit for rehabilitation expenditures for buildings, including those in high cost areas, that achieve enhanced energy performance.
